open.title: Metrofibre Outage | Edenvale
open.description: Metrofibre has informed us of a network outage affecting Edenvale, affected clients will experience limited to no connectivity. Metrofibre engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

open.title: Metrofibre Outage | Wolmer & Pretoria North
open.description: Please note users on the Metrofibre network in Wolmer Pretoria North will experience limited to no connectivity due to an outage. Metrofibre engineers are attending to the fault. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

updates.content: Please note that MetroFibre engineers are still busy working on the fibre repair in Wolmer and Pretoria North.
